department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的是教導學生學習BIM(Building Information Modeling)有關知識與技術，並熟悉工程專案執行中可以使用之電腦工具與技術，透過實作練習，使學生瞭解BIM與電腦技術在營建管理之實務應用，提升學生之電腦應用能力。
goal.en: “The principal objectives of the course are to introduce the knowledge and technology of BIM (Building Information Modeling) and to expose students to be familiar with computer tools and systems in executing construction projects. Based on the practices of BIM, scheduling and estimating computer tools and systems, students can improve their capability of implementing learned tools in construction management.“

outline.ch:
1.資通訊技術介紹
2. BIM介紹
3.營建專案作業分析
4.時程管理系統介紹
5.估價與成本管理系統介紹
6.專案實作案例分析
7.BIM工具應用與討論
8.估價工具應用與討論
9.時程管理工具應用與討論
10.成本管理工具應用與討論
11.期末專題報告與討論
outline.en:
1. ICT introduction
2. BIM introduction
3. Process analysis of executing construction project
4. Schedule management system
5. Cost estimating and management system
6. Term project introduction
7. Discussion on practices of implementing BIM tools
8. Discussion on practices of implementing estimating tool
9. Discussion on practices of implementing schedule management tools
10. Discussion on practices of implementing cost management tools
11. Term project presentation and discussion

gradMethod.ch:
1.出席與上課狀況：10％
2.指定論文閱讀書面報告：20％
3.作業：30％
4.期末報告：40％
gradMethod.en:
1.Attendance and Discussion: 10％
2. Reports on Assigned Article Reading: 20％
3.Homework: 30％
4.Term Report: 40％

flexDiscription.ch: 將於16週內與學生討論如何補充兩週的學習內容，包含校外參訪與額外時間授課。

domain.ch:
專案管理


、


資訊與電腦軟體應用
domain.en:
專案管理


、


資訊與電腦軟體應用

ch.competencies: 具備營建管理專業能力
具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力
具備國際論文發表之能力

en.competencies: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability
Capability of presenting and publishing papers in international conferences

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士班。年級:限一年級。
系所:限土木工程學系營建管理博士班。
en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Ph.D. Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.
